pr_title: [EIP-1559] [MINING] Compute base fee and set block header field when creating new block.

timeline.message:
Compute base fee and set block header field when creating new block.

Signed-off-by: Abdelhamid Bakhta <abdelhamid.bakhta@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: is it not missing the "final"? and wouldn't it be better to use an optional instead of a null?
timeline.author: matkt

replies.bodyText:
Cannot be final since i update the value.
It removes the need to have if - else block there.
The base fee field in the block header is null for non EIP-1559 blocks. The getBaseFee() method wraps it in an Optional
replies.author: abdelhamidbakhta
